revised_title: The Chemical Constant of Hydrogen Vapour and the Entropy of Crystalline Hydrogen
tldr: The authors investigate the chemical constant of hydrogen vapour and the entropy of crystalline hydrogen using statistical mechanics and Einstein-Bose statistics. They find that the chemical constant is in excellent agreement with experimental values and discuss the effect of temperature on the composition of mixed crystals of para- and ortho-hydrogen. The authors also calculate the difference between the entropies of different sorts of crystalline hydrogen at absolute zero.
